did.abstract: Business papers of Thomas Edmondson and Isaac Edmondson, merchants dealing in woolen and cotton cloth, some of which was imported from England and some of which were sold in Winchester, Va. One letter includes discussion of the 1812 Embargo Act. Also includes the business transactions of Dr. Thomas Edmondson in the 1840s and a few family letters.
